name: RPS Stickman Fight
description:
This game is made for the Weekly game jam - Week 154 with the theme 'Rock Paper Scissors' and it was made in about 5 days.

In this game you'll play against an AI rock paper scissors but not as you usually play it, instead, you're going to use a rocket launcher to shoot the enemy with rocks, papers , and scissors but with the same rules as the original game.

if you like the game you can check out my other games on my itch.io page.
